main event: Several unidentified flying objects were reported in Cincinnati, Ohio on the night of April 9, 1960.
interesting points: Witnesses observed four bright, thin objects flying slowly and disappearing behind cloud cover,Another sighting at 9:30 PM involved a stationary red light in the northeast that disappeared after several minutes,Witnesses estimated the speed of the object to be about 1600 mph,There were multiple reports of fast-moving objects over the same area on different occasions,The report included a hand-drawn sketch depicting an elongated object with a 'fuzzy' appearance.
sighted object: four bright objects, one red light
